documentation.text:
@title BitcoinUpDown
 @dev A betting game where players predict whether the price of Bitcoin will go up or down within a round duration.

@notice Get the latest price of Bitcoin in USD
 @return The latest price in int256 format

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Minimum amount to add is 1 wei"

arguments.value: Minimum amount to add is 1 wei

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Minimum amount to add is 1 wei"

documentation.text: @notice Adds Ether to the current round's prize pool.

@notice Place a bet for the current round.
 @param _up_down The direction of the bet (UP or DOWN).

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct BitcoinUpDown.Player storage pointer,struct BitcoinUpDown.Round storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

documentation.text: @notice Withdraw winnings for a player if they won in a previous round.
@notice Withdraw accumulated fees for the developer.
@notice End the current round and start a new one.

@dev Internal function to start a new round.
 @param seed The amount to seed the new round's prize pool.
@notice Receive Ether to add to the prize pool.
@notice Fallback function to handle unexpected Ether transfers.

natspec.details: A betting game where players predict whether the price of Bitcoin will go up or down within a round duration.

addToPrizePool().notice: Adds Ether to the current round's prize pool.

bet(uint8).notice: Place a bet for the current round.

params._up_down: The direction of the bet (UP or DOWN).

endRound().notice: End the current round and start a new one.

getPendingWithdraw(address).notice: Calculates the pending withdrawal amount for a player.

returns._0: The amount in wei the player can withdraw.

getPrice().notice: Get the latest price of Bitcoin in USD

returns._0: The latest price in int256 format

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw().notice: Withdraw winnings for a player if they won in a previous round.

withdrawFee().notice: Withdraw accumulated fees for the developer.
